title: TFR Ep. 615: Thor: Love And Thunder, Spiderhead, TFR Libs
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt check in on what’s been going on in the ol’ MCU as Phase 4 continues with ‘Thor: Love And Thunder’.  Taika Waititi’s ‘Thor: Ragnarok’ is a favorite around these parts and we were anxious to see what was next. Then, HemsFest continues with Joseph Kosinski’s (of Top Gun Maverick fame) reunites with Miles Teller for the paranoia thriller, ‘Spiderhead’.  What experiments would you perform if provided an ample number of inmates in secluded area?  There’s the ravenous review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close out the show with your favorite fill-in-the-blank game, ‘TFR Libs’.  Is Marvel fatigue a thing? 3+ years before a new Bond film? Clerks 3?!? And more!

00:00-19:05: Intro/Thor: Love And Thunder

19:06-33:41: Physical Media Picks

33:42-42:40: Spiderhead

42:41-1:04:41: TFR Libs

1:04:42-1:06:17: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

itunes:summary:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt check in on what’s been going on in the ol’ MCU as Phase 4 continues with ‘Thor: Love And Thunder’.  Taika Waititi’s ‘Thor: Ragnarok’ is a favorite around these parts and we were anxious to see what was next. Then, HemsFest continues with Joseph Kosinski’s (of Top Gun Maverick fame) reunites with Miles Teller for the paranoia thriller, ‘Spiderhead’.  What experiments would you perform if provided an ample number of inmates in secluded area?  There’s the ravenous review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close out the show with your favorite fill-in-the-blank game, ‘TFR Libs’.  Is Marvel fatigue a thing? 3+ years before a new Bond film? Clerks 3?!? And more!
